TMS Library

*/}

Our media products offer engaging self-study materials making learning more effective and enjoyable. We do transform the learning experience.

Our Products

Download applications and content designed just for you.

Study Room

Study Room brings the classroom home, offering live classes and monitoring student behavior to boost focus. It works fully offline, eliminating the need for subscriptions and ensuring access to education without constant internet.

Available on windows, coming soon (Android, Mac, ios)
opendownload(e)}>click to download App

Threx

(The Remote Supervisor)

Threx monitors student devices, allowing access to certain apps only after conditions are met, usually based on their timetable and guardian approval. It automatically restricts unauthorized apps and lets guardians remotely modify the rules for flexible control.

Coming soon (Windows, Android, Mac, ios)

cXplore

(career explorer)

Threx is a powerful tool that monitors student devices, ensuring they can only access specific applications once predefined conditions are met, typically based on their timetable and guardian approval. Threx automatically restricts access to apps or functionalities that students are not permitted to use, helping maintain focus and discipline. One of its standout features is the ability for guardians to remotely modify these rules, offering flexible and seamless control over device usage.

TMS-HRM

Threx is a powerful tool that monitors student devices, ensuring they can only access specific applications once predefined conditions are met, typically based on their timetable and guardian approval. Threx automatically restricts access to apps or functionalities that students are not permitted to use, helping maintain focus and discipline. One of its standout features is the ability for guardians to remotely modify these rules, offering flexible and seamless control over device usage.
